data_table.description: This subject sample mapping file includes a mapping of study subject IDs to sample IDs and sample use. Additionally, each sample is marked as having been used for an Illumina 1M chip, Illumina 2.5M chip, exome sequencing batch 1, and/or exome sequencing batch 2.

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.description: SNP array or whole exome sequencing. Array_SNP: SNP genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays; Seq_DNA_WholeExome: Whole exome sequencing
